metadata.creator: Dr. Simeon Gutierrez
metadata.description: This vol. 11 no. 10,dated September 30, 1947 issue of “Filipinas Magazine” contains short stories, essays, poems, and other literary materials written in Filipino language by various contributors. Some of the literary materials are “Huling Pulot Gata ng Bagong Kasal”,”Sanggunian ng mga Puso”,”Lagalag”, “ Ang Tatlong Kulay ng Bandila” etc.
metadata.subject: magazines
metadata.title: Filipinas Magazine, Sept 30, 1947
